IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: TO PROVIDE HEALTH CARE AND HOUSING FOR THE ELDERLY AND THOSE WITH ALZHIEMER'S AND DEMENTIA.
IRS990.MissionDescription: TO PROVIDE HEALTH CARE AND HOUSING FOR THE ELDERLY AND THOSE WITH ALZHIEMER'S AND DEMENTIA.
IRS990.Description: MENNONITE HOME OF ALBANY PROVIDES ELDERLY ASSISTED LIVING CARE, IN-HOME CARE, RETIREMENT LIVING AND HIGH QUALITY HEALTH CARE TO ALZHEIMERS AND DEMENTIA PATIENTS.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Part IV, Line 2b: Explanation of escrow account liability
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: The organization maintains funds for the convenience of its residents. These amounts are listed as both an asset and a liabiltiy on the organization's balance sheet.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 19: Other Organization Documents Publicly Available
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: These documents are made available to the public by request at the organization's place of business.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 12c: Explanation of Monitoring and Enforcement of Conflicts
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Conflicts of interest are disclosed at each meeting of the board of directors and/or meetings of the standing board committees. Known conflicts are addressed at each meeting by the board chair. An annual conflict of interest statement is signed by all members.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 11: Form 990 Review Process
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The form and supporting schedules are reviewed by the finance committee of the board of directors prior to being filed. Each board member receives a complete copy of Form 990 and schedules.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 7a: How Members or Shareholders Elect Governing Body
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Mennonite Health Services, the organization's sponsor, apopints all board members.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 2: Description of Business or Family Relationship of Officers, Directors, Et
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Randy Friesen and Nancy Friesen have a family relationship.
